title: Constructing an Astronomical Image
content:
Now letâ€™s see what happens when you move the sliders.

  • Move the slider next to the g filter all the way to the right.
  • Move the slider next to the g filter back to its original location (so that the image looked as it did before you moved it).
  • Now move the slider next to the r filter all the way to the left.

question.title: Question #1
question.label: What happens to the appearance of the image?

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Explain why the appearance of the image changed in the way it did.
